code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./Countdown.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const COUNTDOWN_TARGET=new Date("2024-08-24T09:59:59");const getTimeLeft=()=>{const totalTimeLeft=COUNTDOWN_TARGET-new Date();const days=Math.floor(totalTimeLeft/(1000*60*60*24));const hours=Math.floor(totalTimeLeft/(1000*60*60)%24);const minutes=Math.floor(totalTimeLeft/(1000*60)%60);const seconds=Math.floor(totalTimeLeft/1000%60);return{days,hours,minutes,seconds};};const Countdown=()=>{const[timeLeft,setTimeLeft]=useState(()=>getTimeLeft());useEffect(()=>{const timer=setInterval(()=>{setTimeLeft(getTimeLeft());},1000);return()=>{clearInterval(timer);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"countdown",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Countdown"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content",children:Object.entries(timeLeft).map(el=>{const label=el[0];const value=el[1];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"value",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"label",children:[" ",label," "]})]},label);})})]});};export default Countdown;
